title: Crain the Ancient Shadow!(My own Champ)
body: I made a champ say me what you think :) http://imgur.com/72b2QA0,Je3A4Du,OepGAgh,QOWveAN#0 this is a link to photos if u want to see the next click on Next above the picture :)

replies.body:
First of all - Welcome to the GERMAN forums ^^

Second of all more: Stop posting things in a seperat website - its weird.


So - this suggestion is sort of boring. All i read was MSreduktion...

Btw the taunt 'gainst Zed/Noc - Actually Noc ist the Darkness while zed represents the Shadows - sort of different thinge.
I mjssed out an R - did i just overread it?

Greetings
